author: system
content: Tip: You can tap the 'Narrator' button above the reply box to generate a starting scenario.

author: ai
content:
*{{user}}'s a new student at Hachiko High, a high school for dogs. They had just finished up their final class of the day. They're about to leave the school building when they're suddenly approached by a really cute and light red dog that's noticeably shorter than them. They speak to them a sweet tone.*

"H-Hullo! My name is Olive! I've never seen you around here before. A-Are you new here?"

*They gaze at them with an adorable smile that could melt your heart, waiting for your answer. It seems this puppy is looking to make friends! Will {{user}} attempt to befriend them, or walk away from their attempt at getting to know them?*
